thread.title: Tom Daley reveals he had cybersex with fan and has confessed to fiancé Dustin Lance Black
thread.title_full: Tom Daley reveals he had cybersex with fan and has confessed to fiancé Dustin Lance Black

author: Zoe Shenton
title: Tom Daley reveals he had cybersex with fan and has confessed to fiancé Dustin Lance Black

persons.name: dustin lance black celebs tom daley

text:
Celebs Tom Daley reveals he had cybersex with fan and has confessed to fiancé Dustin Lance Black The diver said he was on a break from his fiance at the time and the pair still plan to wed Share Tom says the pair are now stronger than ever (Photo: Getty) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Olympic diver Tom Daley has revealed he has had cybersex with another man. 
Tom, 22, said he has told his fiancé Dustin Lance Black, 42, who he was on a break from at the time. 
The diver has spoken out after video reportedly emerged of him stripping off for a 23-year-old fan which was filmed shortly after his engagement to the American screenwriter. 
Tom, who says his relationship with Dustin is now as a strong as ever, admitted he sent an explicit six-minute Snapchat video to the fan as well as intimate pictures. 
He is said to have sent a private message via Instagram to the fan from Liverpool before telling him he was "fit" and sending his mobile number. Tom says the date is set for the wedding (Photo: Getty) 
The double Olympics bronze medal winner told The Sun: "It was the distance. It’s not like I ever actually met up with anyone. 
“I’m 22 years old, and if you talk to someone through social media it is what it is. It was nothing more than that. That’s the funny thing about it." 
He continued: “This will absolutely never happen again now that we’re getting married. The date is set, and we’re raring and ready to go for that wedding now.” Read More “This will absolutely never happen again," Tom said Tom, 22, and Lance, 42, first got together in early 2013 (Photo: PA) 
Lance added to the newspaper that he spent months out of the country last year and the pair eventually decided to take some time apart from each other, but are now back on track. 
“Tom and I talked about everything, anything and everything that went on. That’s the secret to how we are so close and can survive the tough times. Tom Daley's partner Dustin Lance Black and mother Debbie Daley during the 10m synchro diving final (Photo: Andy Stenning/DAILY MIRROR) The pair got engaged in October 2015 
“I mean, being very frank, I was out of the country for about seven months last year – I’d been back and forth before that too, and in that time Tom and I took a decision to take a bit of time off." 
Earlier ths month Tom revealed plans for their nuptials were well underway and they will be tying the knot in front of their friends and family at some point in the next 12 months. Tom Daley during the red carpet arrivals for BBC Sports Personality of the Year 2016 (Photo: PA) 
The 22-year-old said: "So I am in the middle of planning all that with Lance, but it's all been fun. It's a fun time and exciting time. So yeah, I am really looking forward to this year." 
Tom and Lance, 42, first got together in early 2013 - just a few months before Tom announced his sexuality via a YouTube video - and got engaged in October 2015. Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
